bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: Ubuntu Xenial / Tensorflow-Lite / No-Tensorflow: Build Error
bug.description: In a Ubuntu machine without tensorflow, but with tensorflow-lite, I get: <denchmark-code>... [74/163] Compiling C++ object 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sha/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o'. FAILED: ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sha/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o c++ -Iext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sha -Iext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter -I../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter -Igst/nnstreamer -I../gst/nnstreamer -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -I/usr/include/gstreamer-1.0 -I/usr/include/orc-0.4 -fdiagnostics-color=always -pipe -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Winvalid-pch -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Werror -std=c++14 -g '-DVERSION="1.0.0"' -Wredundant-decls -Wwrite-strings -Wformat -Wformat-nonliteral -Wformat-security -Winit-self -Waddress -Wno-multichar -Wvla -Wpointer-arith -DHAVE_ORC=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW_LITE=1 -DENABLE_PYTORCH=1 -DENABLE_CAFFE2=1 -fPIC -pthread -Wno-sign-compare -MD -MQ 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sha/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o' -MF 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sha/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o.d' -o 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sha/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o' -c /source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc In file included from /source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc:30:0: /source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.h:33:10: fatal error: tensorflow/contrib/lite/model.h: No such file or directory #include <tensorflow/contrib/lite/model.h> ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ compilation terminated. [77/163] Compiling C++ object 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sta/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o'. FAILED: ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sta/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o c++ -Iext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sta -Iext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter -I../ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter -Igst/nnstreamer -I../gst/nnstreamer -I/usr/include/glib-2.0 -I/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/glib-2.0/include -I/usr/include/gstreamer-1.0 -I/usr/include/orc-0.4 -fdiagnostics-color=always -pipe -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -Wall -Winvalid-pch -Wnon-virtual-dtor -Werror -std=c++14 -g '-DVERSION="1.0.0"' -Wredundant-decls -Wwrite-strings -Wformat -Wformat-nonliteral -Wformat-security -Winit-self -Waddress -Wno-multichar -Wvla -Wpointer-arith -DHAVE_ORC=1 -DENABLE_TENSORFLOW_LITE=1 -DENABLE_PYTORCH=1 -DENABLE_CAFFE2=1 -fPIC -pthread -Wno-sign-compare -MD -MQ 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sta/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o' -MF 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sta/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o.d' -o 'ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/584bea7@@nnstreamer_filter_tensorflow-lite@sta/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc.o' -c /source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc In file included from /source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.cc:30:0: /source/AutoDrv/NNStreamer/ext/nnstreamer/tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite_core.h:33:10: fatal error: tensorflow/contrib/lite/model.h: No such file or directory #include <tensorflow/contrib/lite/model.h> ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ compilation terminated. ... </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1947>#1947</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
In my case, I got the same error, but after reinstalling tensorflow-lite-dev, this problem was fixed.

Found it. It was resolved with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/ubuntuport-tensorflow/commit/cbe167941e89aca5190da0d0a7a152112de06fe3>nnsuite/ubuntuport-tensorflow@cbe1679</denchmark-link> :)
